name: information-management-and-security-team-enquiry-log
title: Information Management and Security Team Enquiry Log
description: This dataset is an abridged version of the Information Management and Security Team enquiry log. The log is used to record, track and report on all of the enquiries received by this team at the Food Standards Agency. The team provide advice and guidance on any aspect of information governance, security, records management and data protection, as well as on the use of the FSA corporate records management system.

resources.name: Information Management and Security Team Enquiry Log 2015
resources.description: This dataset is an abridged version of the Information Management and Security Team enquiry log for the calendar year of 2015. The log is used to record, track and report on all of the enquiries received by this team at the Food Standards Agency. The team provide advice and guidance on any aspect of information governance, security, records management and data protection, as well as on the use of the FSA corporate records management system.

fields.name: Ref
fields.title: Unique enquiry ref within the reporting period

fields.name: Directorate
fields.title: FSA Directorate the enquirer was in
